ygData.msgSnippet: Dear Prof. Goodwin, I found in gaskinetics.cpp that reverse rates are only computed when doIrreversible=true. Shouldn t it depend on the reaction-flag, e.g.

Dear Prof. Goodwin,

I found in 'gaskinetics.cpp' that reverse rates are on=
ly computed when
doIrreversible=3Dtrue. Shouldn't it depend on the reaction=
-flag, e.g.
when the reaction is reversible, the reverse rate is calculated=
,
otherwise it is zero?

best regards
Ulf
